construct.name: vhh_1XIW_0001_crossmab
construct.notes: CrossMab format with CH1-CL swap on CD3 arm for correct LC pairing. Knob-in-hole mutations for HC heterodimerization.

construct.name: fab_1XIW_0003_crossmab
construct.notes: CrossMab format with CH1-CL swap on CD3 arm for correct LC pairing. Knob-in-hole mutations for HC heterodimerization.

construct.name: vhh_1XIW_0001_fab_scfv
construct.notes: Asymmetric Fab + scFv format. Target arm is Fab, CD3 arm is scFv fused to Fc. Knob-in-hole for HC heterodimerization. scFv linker: GGGGSGGGGSGGGGS

construct.name: fab_1XIW_0003_fab_scfv
construct.notes: Asymmetric Fab + scFv format. Target arm is Fab, CD3 arm is scFv fused to Fc. Knob-in-hole for HC heterodimerization. scFv linker: GGGGSGGGGSGGGGS

construct.name: vhh_1XIW_0001_fab_vhh
construct.notes: Asymmetric Fab + VHH format. Target arm is Fab, CD3 arm is single-domain VHH fused to Fc. Knob-in-hole for HC heterodimerization. Smallest asymmetric bispecific format.

construct.name: fab_1XIW_0003_fab_vhh
construct.notes: Asymmetric Fab + VHH format. Target arm is Fab, CD3 arm is single-domain VHH fused to Fc. Knob-in-hole for HC heterodimerization. Smallest asymmetric bispecific format.

construct.name: vhh_1XIW_0001_igg_scfv
construct.notes: IgG-(scFv)2 Morrison format (symmetric). Bivalent for both targets: 2x Fab(target), 2x scFv(CD3). scFv fused to C-terminus of both heavy chains. scFv linker: GGGGSGGGGSGGGGS, Fc fusion linker: GGGGSGGGGS
